author: filmaj
msg: Updated README with new Ant build instructions, expanded instructions on setting up fresh BlackBerry project in Eclipse.

author: filmaj
msg: Added build.xml to PhoneGap BlackBerry repository. Allows you to build BlackBerry application binaries from source using Apache Ant and BB Ant Tools (google it).

author: filmaj
msg: Updated Contacts API following the contacts API review meeting. Now should properly return new Contacts interface-based objects.

author: bowserj
msg: Fixing the build process, found Android 2.0 bugs
